DataElement.preferredName: Second Bridge Therapy Administered Course Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number of cycles of second bridge therapy administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: _Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude._Therapy intended to transition a patient from one therapy or medication to another or maintain their health or status until they are a candidate for a therapy or have decided on a therapy._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test):The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude._Therapy intended to transition a patient from one therapy or medication to another or maintain their health or status until they are a candidate for a therapy or have decided on a therapy._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.
Therapy intended to transition a patient from one therapy or medication to another or maintain their health or status until they are a candidate for a therapy or have decided on a therapy.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a protocol specific identifier used to indicate the treatment course or cycle.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Changed max length from 10 to 6 and datatype to Number per CDUS clean-up.
